casebody.data:
INTERSAL, INC.
v.
HAMILTON, et al. 115A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2018 David H. Harris, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Intersal, Inc. Brian Rabinovitz, Olga Vysotskaya de Brito, Amar Majmundar, Charles G. Whitehead, Special Deputy Attorneys General, Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, for North Carolina Department of Natural and Cultural Resources, et al. Jeffrey A. Doyle, Raleigh, Joshua D. Neighbors, Attorneys at Law, for Friends of Queen Anne's Revenge (Non-Profit Corporation)

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of December 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of December 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 25th day of January 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
